directions: Toss cabbage, red bell pepper, onion, celery, jalapeno pepper, and fresh ginger in a large salad bowl. Whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, lime juice, sugar, sesame oil, and salt in a separate bowl until dressing is smooth. Pour dressing over slaw and toss to combine. Let stand at least 1 hour; serve sprinkled with chopped peanuts.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons seeded and minced jalapeno pepper
title: Asian-American Slaw With Peanuts and Jalapenos
